```{r}
harp_mod <- stilly_bens %>% 
  filter(pop == "fall_chinook")

ben_by_scen <- harp_mod %>% 
  group_by(scenario) %>% 
    summarise(total_benefit = sum(n)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(total_benefit))


ben_by_scen %>% gt()
```
